testcase.name: Successfully login with correct credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the chrome browser........................................passed And User open the URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"............passed When User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin".....passed And Click on login..........................................................passed Then Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User click on log out link.............................................passed Then Page Title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And Close Browser...........................................................passed
